configuration.title: Configuration
configuration.description: Configure your O365 Tenant, proxy settings and logging level

entity.label: Name
entity.help: Only letters, numbers and underscores are supported

validators.errorMsg: Only letters, numbers and underscores are supported.
Name must be less than 995 characters.

entity.label: Tenant ID
entity.help: The Directory ID from Azure Active Directory.

validators.errorMsg: Please provide valid Tenant ID.

entity.label: Client ID
entity.help: The Application ID from the registered application within the Azure Active Directory.

validators.errorMsg: Please provide valid Client ID.

entity.label: Client Secret
entity.help: The registered application key for the corresponding application.

entity.label: Change CAS Token
entity.help: Change Cloud App Security Token.

entity.label: Cloud App Security Token
entity.help: The registered application Token for the corresponding tenant.

entity.label: Tenant Subdomain
entity.help: The Cloud App Security Portal url: https://<tenant_subdomain>.<tenant_data_center>

validators.errorMsg: Tenant Subdomain must be less than 63 characters.
Only letters, numbers and underscores are supported.

entity.label: Tenant Data Center
entity.help: The Cloud App Security Portal url: https://<tenant_subdomain>.<tenant_data_center>

validators.errorMsg: Data Center must be less than 63 characters.
Only letters, numbers and underscores are supported.
Log level must be one of: DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR

entity.label: Host
entity.help: Hostname or IP address
entity.tooltip: Hostname: www.example.com or IPv4: 192.0.1.1 or IPv6: [1111:2222:3333:4444:CCCC:DDDD:EEEE:FFFF]

validators.errorMsg: Invalid port number, it should be an integer between 1 and 65535.
Invalid port number, it should be an integer between 1 and 65535.
Maximum length allowed for username is 50
Only letters, numbers and underscores are supported

entity.label: Start date/time
entity.help: Start date/time should be in 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS' (UTC) format. Default is 4 hours ago.

validators.errorMsg: Interval (seconds) must be either a non-negative number, CRON interval or -1.
Only letters, numbers and underscores are supported
Interval (seconds) must be either a non-negative number, CRON interval or -1.
Only letters, numbers and underscores are supported
Interval (seconds) must be either a non-negative number, CRON interval or -1.
Only letters, numbers and underscores are supported

entity.label: Start Date
entity.help: Start Date should be in 'YYYY-MM-DD'(UTC) format.(Default is 7 days ago.).

entity.label: Delay Throttle (In Days)
entity.help: Microsoft generally reports events with a delay of at least 2 days.

validators.errorMsg: Interval (seconds) must be either a non-negative number, CRON interval or -1.
Only letters, numbers and underscores are supported

entity.help: Start Date should be in 'YYYY-MM-DD'(UTC) format.(Default is 7 days ago.).

entity.label: Delay Throttle (In Days)
entity.help: Microsoft generally reports events with a delay of at least 2 days.

entity.help: Microsoft generally reports events with a delay of at least 2 days.

Only letters, numbers and underscores are supported

entity.label: Start Date
entity.help: Start Date should be in 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS'(UTC) format.(Default is 1 days ago.).

validators.errorMsg: Interval (seconds) must be either a non-negative number, CRON interval or -1.

entity.label: Request Timeout (seconds)

validators.errorMsg: Request Timeout must be a non-zero positive integer.

entity.help: Specify the maximum amount of time (in seconds) to wait for a response from API.

entity.label: Query Window Size (minutes)
entity.help: Specify how many minute's worth of data to query.

validators.errorMsg: Query Window Size must be a non-zero positive integer.

entity.label: Delay Throttle (minutes)
entity.help: Specify delay throttle based on the latency observed in Azure Sign-in Audit Logs.

validators.errorMsg: Delay Throttle must be a positive integer.
Only letters, numbers and underscores are supported
Interval (seconds) must be either a non-negative number, CRON interval or -1.

entity.label: Input Name
entity.help: Enter a unique name for the data input

validators.errorMsg: Only letters, numbers and underscores are supported for the Input Name and it should not start with numbers and underscores.
Length of Input Name should be between 1 and 100.

entity.label: Start date/time
entity.help: Start date/time should be in 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS'(UTC) format.(Default is 5 days ago.).

entity.label: End date/time
entity.help: End date/time should be in 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS'(UTC) format.

validators.errorMsg: Index Name may contain only letters, numbers, underscores, or hyphens. It must begin with a letter or number.

entity.label: Interval (seconds)

validators.errorMsg: Interval (seconds) must be either a non-negative number, CRON interval or -1.

entity.help: Time interval of input in seconds.

entity.label: Query Window Size (minutes)
entity.help: Specify how many minute's worth of data to query each interval.

entity.label: Delay Throttle (minutes)
entity.help: Microsoft may delay trace events up to 24 hours. Specify how close to now a query may run (smaller values may introduce data loss for large volumes).

validators.errorMsg: Only letters, numbers and underscores are supported.
Length of Input Name should be between 1 and 100.
Length of Sourcetype should be between 1 to 1024.

entity.label: Query Parameters
entity.help: Example: $filter=startswith(displayName,'a')

validators.errorMsg: Length of Query Parameters should be between 2 to 8192.
Value must start with $.
Interval (seconds) must be either a non-negative number, CRON interval or -1.
